actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of certain lands for addition to the Cumberland Gap National Historical Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the acquisition of specified lands in Bell County, Kentucky, for addition to the Cumberland Gap National Historical Park. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition of certain lands for addition to the Cumberland Gap National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
